statement.p: In 39.29 of the last 28 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{28}}={0.3929}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{28}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3929}\cdot{28}={11.0012}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 28-11.0012=16.9988 We round that as requested to 17.
